Uses of Class
com.method5.jot.scale.ScaleReader

Packages that use ScaleReader
Package
Description
com.method5.jot.entity
Contains core domain entities used throughout the Jot SDK, such as account identifiers, addresses, and network types.
com.method5.jot.entity.metadata
Metadata-specific extensions of core entities, such as types and fields derived from the Substrate runtime metadata.
com.method5.jot.metadata
Handles decoding and traversal of Substrate runtime metadata (v14+), including type lookup, pallet extraction, and call matching.
com.method5.jot.query.model
Internal models and data structures for representing storage query results, such as balances or account info.
